submapp.som.Som.map¶

Som.map(data_map: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Map data onto the SOM

Associate each input vector to the class whose referent vector is the closest to the input vector in the euclidean sense.

Handle missing data: if an entire vector is missing then it is associated to the class -1. If only few values are missing within an input vector then the BMU is found according to the non-missing values remaining

Parameters

data_map (np.ndarray[float], shape = (_, p)) – Vectors that have to be mapped (real data)

Returns

Vector of classes representing each vector of data_map ie: classes[k] is the BMU of data_map[k]

Return type

np.ndarray[float], shape(len(data_map))
